This is a post with executable code.

# R-1


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(reticulate)
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
a<-runif(3)
a<-round(a,2)
print(a)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.23 0.58 0.29
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
b<-"Hello, "
```
:::

# Python


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
c="World!"
d=r.b+c
print(d)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Hello, World!
```
:::

```{.python .cell-code}
e=np.sin(1.5)*12
```
:::


# R-2


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
f<-py$e/3
print(f)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 3.98998
```
:::
:::


# 変数をループで解析して出す



```{.r .cell-code}
analy_titlle <- c("analy_a", "analy_b", "analy_c")

for(i in 1:length(analy_titlle)){
  cat(paste("\n##",  analy_titlle[i], "\n"))
  
  cat(str_c("analysis- ",i))
  
  cat("\n")
}
```


## analy_a 
analysis- 1

## analy_b 
analysis- 2

## analy_c 
analysis- 3



# R version


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
R.version.string
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "R version 4.2.2 (2022-10-31)"
```
:::
:::


# Python version


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
import platform
"Python version "+platform.python_version()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
'Python version 3.10.7'
```
:::
:::
